## ScriptSandbox.listen() method

Listens to messages from the sandbox

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
listen(handler: (this: void, message: ScriptValue) => void): (this: void) => void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  handler | (this: void, message: [ScriptValue](./scripthost-core.scriptvalue.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | The callback to be invoked whenever a message is received |

<b>Returns:</b>

(this: void) =&gt; void

A callback that shall be called to stop receiving messages
